testcase.name: Validate the BrokenLinkImages component under Elements Tile
testcase.system-out: Given User launched a Browser...............................................passed When User opens url "https://demoqa.com"....................................passed Then User verify title of landing Page "DEMOQA".............................passed When User cliks on Elements tab.............................................passed Then User clicks on Broken Link Images button on left rail elements.........passed And User verifies the header of Broken Link Images page "Broken Links - Images".passed And User verify the valid image.............................................passed And User clicks on valid link and verify the response.......................passed And User clicks on broken link and verify the response......................passed And User close the browser..................................................passed
